content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DUR
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0002
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise a message when --DUR exists in a dataset, confirm collected and
  not derived .
Outcome:
  Message: --DUR exists in a dataset, confirm collected and not derived.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0002
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived.
                Document: SDTM v2.0
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise a message when --DUR exists in a dataset, confirm collected and not derived .

Outcome.Message: --DUR exists in a dataset, confirm collected and not derived.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived.
